/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
